verses.name: Nehemiah 13:9
verses.text: Then I commanded, and they cleansed the chambers: and thither brought I again the vessels of the house of God, with the meat offering and the frankincense.

verses.name: Nehemiah 13:10
verses.text: And I perceived that the portions of the Levites had not been given them: for the Levites and the singers, that did the work, were fled every one to his field.

verses.name: Nehemiah 13:11
verses.text: Then contended I with the rulers, and said, Why is the house of God forsaken? And I gathered them together, and set them in their place.
